content.rendered:
plant-based, planet-friendly and made for puppies!

NUTRITIONALLY COMPLETE VEGAN PUPPY FOOD SINCE 2012

From the moment your puppy enters your life, you want to be sure you're giving your new companion animal exactly what they need.

Celebrating its 10th year, Benevo Puppy is a nutritionally complete vegan puppy food, meaning it has everything your energetic pup needs, with no need for supplements.

Our wheat-free recipe makes it ideal for those dogs that also suffer from sensitivities to wheat protein, a common ingredient in dry dog foods.

Benevo Puppy has 27% plant protein with added calcium to help support healthy muscle and bone growth. Expertly formulated to meet the nutritional requirements of healthy puppies aged between 1 month and 2 years.

Add 10kg to your basket
See All Puppy Food

Powerful Puppy sized kibble

Puppies come in all shapes and sizes, and so Benevo Puppy is made with a smaller-sized kibble, which is perfect for puppies, whether they have a small or big bite.

As well as omega oils, our unique recipe contains Taurine and L-carnitine supplements that play an essential role in regulating heartbeat and metabolising fats for muscle strength and stamina.

Shop Puppy Food

Good for your puppy
and for the planet

Animal agriculture is responsible for 14% to 18% of global greenhouse-gas emissions – more than all forms of transportation combined.

Removing animal products from yours and your pet's diet may be one of the best things you can do to reduce your household carbon emissions.

Approved by the UK Vegan and Vegetarian Societies since 2012, PeTA and GMO free.

Shop puppy food

IS IT NATURAL?

Puppies are classed as omnivores, so like us humans, they can survive and thrive on a plant-based diet too. Studies suggest dogs split from wolves around 20,000-40,000 years ago and they were domesticated between 15,000-30,000 year ago.

So they have lived with humans co-existing on the same foods ever since. So yes, professional meat-free, plant-based puppy food is fine and as natural as buying them a bed, or a raincoat, feeding them from a bowl or taking them to a vet 🙂

Shop Puppy food

For many, it's hard to believe a healthy vegan puppy food exists, so we think it's important to explain where our journey began

2011

2012

After the success of our adult dog food, we began researching a way to help those who wished to rescue puppies without compromising their ethics

Using established international guidelines, we scoured the planet looking for reliable suppliers of those nutrients from non-animal sources

Then, working alongside independent professional animal nutritionists, we balanced a tasty and complete recipe for puppies!

Finally, we took our own money and made the 1st meat-free, wheat-free, plant-based puppy food in the UK in 2012!

Ready to switch?

Great! Then here are Benevo products suitable for Puppies.

Want to try before you buy?

In our experience, puppies take very well to our foods, however we understand if you want to try a small amount first, so before committing to a large bag send us a message.

would you like to know more?
